“mini pettiyayi hars ekayi dekama dan kanaththa langatama awilla eke walalenna bari nisa api ayin una..thawa duratath shrilanipaya eksath jathika pakshaye ellila hitiyoth pakshayak widihata aayeth goda ganna bari tharamata apiwa watenawa.haki ikmanin jathika aanduwen shrilanipaya iwath wiya yuthuyi.”yayi hitapu amathya dayasiri jayasekara mahatha mita sulu mohothakata pera shrilanipa mulasthanaye pawathi madhya hamuwakadi kiweya.madhya hamuwa sadaha amathikam athhara damu es.bi.disanayaka,dilan perera,chandima wirakkodi ekwa sitiyaha.ehidi madhyawedin jayasekara mahathata kiwe kabinat madhya hamuwa dayasiri jayasekara mahatha nomathiwa paluwata yana bawayi.eeta jayasekara mahatha dunne kadima pilithuraki.

2011.11.8 dina bahara kala nohaki paramadhipathyaya janathawa sathuwa thibiyadi “uuna kriyakari wyawasayan ho uuna upayojitha wathkam punarudaya” kirime panath ketumpatha pilibadawala wenath de athara, janathawage adahas wimasimata awasthawa labadime janatha ayithiya prashnayata thudu dena ayurin ahimi kirima wataha ganima ugahata wana bawa danwamin garu kathanayakathumata nihal shri amarasekara wisin yawana lada lipiya wadidura kiyawima »
